<L>817<pc>090-1<k1>Arjuni<k2>Arjuni<h>1
{@Ārjuni@}<sup>1</sup>¦ = Abhimanyu: I, 8027; VI, 1824, 2365, 2373,
2460, 2730, 3223, 3436, 3559, 4560, 4584, 4613, 4747, 5158,
5406; VII, 546, 548, 556, 1509, †1550 (cf. Arjunāvaraḥ),
1553, 1557, 1564, 1579, 1597, 1623, 1626, 1630, 1636, 1659,
[Page090-b+ 63]
1725, 1736, 1768, 1783, 1786, 1803, 1818, 1821, 1840, 1852,
1855, 1856, 1874, 1897, 1898, 1909, 1920, 1963; XIV, 1958.
<LEND>
